mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM qa_question q WHERE q.category_id = #{categoryId} AND q.delete_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM qa_answer a JOIN qa_question q ON a.question_id = q.id WHERE q.category_id = #{categoryId} AND q.delete_flag = 0 AND a.delete_flag = 0

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.icon, COALESCE(qc.cnt, 0) AS questionCount FROM qa_category c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT category_id, COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM qa_question WHERE delete_flag = 0 GROUP BY category_id ) qc ON qc.category_id = c.id WHERE c.delete_flag = 0 AND c.status = 1 AND c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.sort ASC, c.created_at DESC
